pr_title: Enable builtinoperations, typeof and unary unit tests

replies.bodyText: I used do-while use because first iteration should be executed.
replies.author: KavinduZoysa

replies.bodyText: But you are not terminating based on a condition in the while(). So it anyway runs the first one right?

timeline.bodyText: indexedExpressionNode.keyExpression() is called multiple times. extract it to a variable

timeline.bodyText: else, throw an exception. Then its easy to debug, if something goes wrong.

timeline.bodyText:
Good to break this in to two statements, for readability.
There are several other places as well.

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like this methods creates a ArrayType. 'BLangArray' is not intuitive.
Can we simply say createBLangArrayType?
